text: ABC Motors is a United Kingdom engine and aircraft manufacturer. The headquarter is in Hersham, surrey. == Engines == * ABC 6 hp * ABC 8 hp * ABC 30 hp * ABC 60 hp * ABC 100 hp * ABC Dragonfly * ABC Gadfly * ABC Gnat * ABC Mosquito * ABC Hornet * ABC Scorpion * ABC Wasp == Aircraft == * ABC Robin Category:Manufacturing companies of the United Kingdom
title: ABC Motors
